428620.name: Longsword Founder's Pack
428620.description:
The Founder's Pack DLC is your limited-time opportunity to own the full release collection of Longsword Tabletop Tactics cards. You will receive a full play set of every card in the game (except for a limited number of miniature re-skins that can only be earned through play).

You will also a receive a Longsword Faction Token to share with friends or to trade on the Steam Marketplace. Each token represents one of the factions in the game, and whoever possesses the token in their Steam Inventory will have access to every card from that faction. This is a great way to share the game with a friend and to get them started out with a proper collection.
428620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
